description: This file defines the Event model class in a Laravel application, including its properties, relationships, serialization, and search indexing configurations.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Eloquent model representing an event, with properties, relationships, and methods for serialization and search indexing.

methods.name: venue
methods.description: Defines a one-to-one relationship with Venue.

methods.name: sale
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with EventSaleSummary.

methods.name: ticket_sales
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with TicketSale.

methods.name: ticket_packages
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with TicketPackage.

methods.name: managerr
methods.description: Defines a one-to-one relationship with User as manager.

methods.name: promotion
methods.description: Defines a one-to-one relationship with Promotion.

methods.name: invitations
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with EventInvitation.

methods.name: getPromotions
methods.description: Returns the coupon code of the associated promotion, if any.

methods.name: coordinators
methods.description: Defines a many-to-many relationship with User as coordinators.

methods.name: addons
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with EventAddon.

methods.name: payment_gateways
methods.description: Defines a many-to-many relationship with PaymentGateway.

methods.name: serialize
methods.description: Serializes the Event object into an array, including related data and computed fields.

methods.name: toSearchableArray
methods.description: Returns an array of searchable attributes for the event, used by Scout.

methods.name: getActivitylogOptions
methods.description: Configures activity logging options for the model.
